description: The most FUNomenal time you'll find in the great state of Arkansas, Kona Ice Bentonville is bringing you the coolest treat to ever hit the streets! Nothing refreshes you like shaved ice, and nobody does that better than Kona Ice! Flavored just the way you like with their patented FLAVORWAVE station, you know you'll love it each and every time, so look for them today!
name: Kona Ice Bentonville
